maqras.text: “Far, very far is that which you are promised
“There is nothing but our life in the present. We die and we live, but we will never be raised up again
“He is but one who invents a lie against God, but we are not ones to believe in him.”
He said, “Lord help me, for they accuse me of lying.”
God said, “In but a little while, they are sure to be sorry.”
Then the blast overtook them with justice, and We made them as remains of dead leaves. So away with the people who do wrong
Then We produced after them other generations
No people can hasten their term, nor can they delay it

Then We sent our messengers in succession. Every time there came to a people their messenger they accused him of falsehood. So We made them follow each other in punishment. We made them as a tale that is told. So away with a people who will not believe
Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and with clear authority
And to Pharaoh and his nomarchs. But they behaved arrogantly. They were a people conceited
They said, “Shall we believe in two people like ourselves while their people are subject to us?”
So they accused them of falsehood, and they became of those that were caused to perish
And We gave Moses the Book, in order that they might receive guidance
And We made the son of Mary and his mother as a sign. We gave them both shelter on a high ground of tranquility, and springs
O you messengers, enjoy things good and refined, and work righteousness, for I am well acquainted with all that you do
And indeed this community of yours is a single community, and I am your Lord. Therefore fear Me and no other
But the people cut off the events of unity between them into sects. Each group rejoices in that which is with it
But leave them in their confused ignorance for now
Do they think that because We have granted them abundance of wealth and sons
That We would funnel them all the good. No, they do not understand
Indeed those who live in awe for fear of their Lord
Those who believe in the signs of their Lord
Those who do not join in worship, partners with their Lord
And those who give their charity with their hearts full of awe, because they will return to their Lord
It is these who hasten in every good work, and these are foremost in them
On no soul do We place a burden greater than she can bear. Before Us is a record that clearly shows the truth. They will never be wronged
But their hearts are in confused ignorance of this, and there are besides that, deeds of theirs that they will continue to do
Until We seize them in punishment. Those of them that received the good things of the present behold, they will cry in supplication
It will be said, “Cry not in supplication this day, for you will certainly not be helped by Us
“My signs used to be rehearsed to you, but you used to turn back on your heels
“In arrogance. Speaking wrongfully about it by night.”
Do they not ponder over the Word, or has anything new come to them that did not come to their ancestors
Or do they not recognize their messenger, so they reject him
Or do they say, “He is possessed?” No, he has brought them the truth, but most of them hate the truth
If the truth had been in accord with their desires, truly the heavens and the earth, and all beings therein would have been in chaos. No, We have sent them advice, but they turn away from the advice
Or is it that you ask them for some reward? But the reward of your Lord is best. He is the best of those who give sustenance
But indeed you call them to the straight way
And indeed those who do not believe in the hereafter are deviating from that way
